short_summary: procurement for purchase, delivery and installation of rotaty chairs
description: The contractor will be procured under a Supply Arrangement(SA). A purchaser of the government will purchase a sequent of rotary chairs in Charlottetown, PEI, and the contractor will be required to deliver and install the chairs.",
full_summary:
## Business Opportunities
### Government of Canada Procurement Information

#### Tender Details

* **Ergonomic Chair Procurement**
	+ **Reference Number**: PW-22-01009237
	+ **Solicitation Number**: 3000751324
	+ **Amendment Number**: 2
	+ **Tender Closing Date**: October 25, 2022 at 13:00:00
	+ **Expected Contract Start Date**: N/A
	+ **Expected Contract End Date**: N/A

#### Government of Canada Procurement Details

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Trade Agreements**: *Set-Aside Program for Aboriginal Business (SPAB)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: Prince Edward Island
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)

#### Information for Suppliers

* **Notice URL**: https://buyandsell.gc.ca/
* **Attachment**: [Attachments]
* **Tender Description**: Veterans Affairs Canada is seeking the purchase, delivery, and installation of ergonomic chairs with rotating chairs in Charlottetown, PE by March 31, 2023. This procurement is set aside under the Federal Government’s Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business. Suppliers must be pre-qualified and have been issued a supply arrangement to be eligible to bid. For more information, please contact RCNAmeublement.NCRFurniture@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Lynn Paulin
* **Contact Email**: lynn.paulin@veterans.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone**: 782-377-4105
* **Contracting Entity**: Veterans Affairs Canada
* **Address**: Jean Canfield Building, 1st Floor, 191 Great George Street, Charlottetown, PE C1A 4L2
